featured.text: From (A) to (F) below, choose the ONES that are true for both jackdaws and turtle ants.
Jackdaws are birds in the crow family often Turtle ants often live in the cavities of dead found in the English countryside.
Studies on jackdaws and turtle ants may provide some insights into the issue.

definition.zh_def: 一種中等大小的黑色鳥類，屬於烏鴉科，通常有灰色的頸部和胸部，常見於歐亞大陸。
definition.en_def: A medium-sized black bird belonging to the crow family, typically with a gray neck and chest, commonly found in Eurasia.
definition.example: The jackdaw perched on the fence, cawing loudly to attract attention.
